name: Nikole Packey
text: Great lunch specials! The new cheesy bread is fantastic! Quick and friendly service.

name: kjken kelly
text: Happy Father's Day to ME! Ordered A Pizza & Grilled Sub Online. Excellent Pizza and Sub was Huge! Delivery was right on time! I'm very Satisfied. I will Recommend this Place to Everyone! I will be a Loyal repeat Customer! 5‚≠ê from Me!

name: A T
text: Great taste when the food is actually made with care and not cold. Staff is hit or miss with service. Shame... seems to have really gone downhill.

name: Brandon Penn
text: Need to either train or hire better employees. Put online order in at 450 which would be ready in 20 minutes. Still not ready at 532. One lady put her order in at 430. No one answering phone, plenty of staff working. Makes no sense. Looks like it is pizza hut from now on.

name: Carter Jones
text: I finally understand why it is called hungry Howie‚Äòs it is simply put because Howie won‚Äôt even eat his own food...

name: Jessica Boswell
text: I placed a milti-item order online and picked it up. Although my food was ready before the promised time, one item had not been made. A staff member notified the manager and she kindly apologized for the error. Since I had already paid ‚Ä¶More

name: Chi Om
text: Choose elsewhere.. the staff is not clean, used to work there.  It's run by an incompetent manager whom does not enforce hand washing or other basic cleanliness.  Go elsewhere!!!

name: King Bourisz
text: Got the subs today we're very good and filling

name: amy K
text: Awesome food ...clean place as well

name: Chillin Chinchillas
text: I love howies, im sad im moving but this location has always had awesome delivery. Really nice drivers. I usually order weekly for the last two years. Thanks for the memories. üòö

name: Thomas Rehberg
text: I went in to order and was told by some rude young woman to wait.....she was by her self and i waited and waited and finally just walked out. Never again that store

name: Tammy Mannon
text: Yummy pizza, and Howie Rolls...and you can choose from several flavored crusts!!

name: Shawn H
text: Great pizza and cheese breads. Friendly staff quick service. there's also large area to eat in. Close to the airport for travelers

name: Jonathan Combs
text: I didn't have high expectations for this place, but was pleasantly surprised. Both the pizza and 3 Cheeser Howie Bread was tasty. Service was very good. I wish I had a Hungry Howie's near where I live!

name: Chris Heck
text: Pretty darn good subs, unique.

name: Kyle Rhines
text: Hour and a half wait times have become the norm. Order is Wrong 4 out of 5 times. Hung up on during more than one occasion. Only redeeming quality was the manager tonight finally offered a credit but only after asking what was going on. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Nancy Williams
text: I ordered a salad very good and large for a regular enough for two people.  Good service

name: Robert Miller
text: Pizza is good but messed up our order and we were face to face.

name: Daniel Getz
text: Great prices and good pizza....for a franchise location.  Love the flavor crust!

name: Hilary Warren
text: Loved the online ordering, it was super easy to navigate and to pay. We got a deep dish (it isn't like real Chicago deep dish, but instead like thick crust pizza), it was delicious. The garlic herb crust was awesome! Will defiantly be ordering again!!

name: pSonia Irizarry
text: Delicious pizza and outstanding server.

name: Mary B
text: I‚Äôve ordered from the other hungry howies on 12th Street a few times and my pizza was always tasteless and either burnt or undercooked, but I decided to give them 1 more try and order from this one. Wow what a difference the pizza was tasty ‚Ä¶More

name: Patrick Jackman
text: Great value!!! Prompt service.

name: Truly Trudy
text: Worst meal I've ever had.  Chicken tenders smelled bad but were completely overcooked.  Hard to chew. The coffee is usually good.  It tasted like it had been sitting for hours, was so strong.  I threw out the chicken and the coffee when I got home.

name: shonna steele
text: Great service and food was great I will be going back there

name: Michelle Portwood
text: Pizza crust was chewy but there were plenty of toppings. The cinnamon bread was very good. The food was not very hot when we got it back to the room.

name: Tyler Stull
text: Great great great food! Ordering online is a plus and usually relatively fast.

name: Amanda Martin

name: G
text: I called to order pizza and then tried to change my order to a special that I had to find myself. I wasn't told of any specials or anything but sarcasm and ignorance. I will never call there again and believe it when I say it that NONE of ‚Ä¶More

text: A 40 min wait turned into a 2 hour wait.  Pizza arrived cold.  Order was missing a sauce.

text: I like the online ordering but it's a gamble if their going to make your order correctly. I always order flavored crust and about 40% of the time they forget to put it on.
